data.comment: Today's referee, Jeroen Manschot, has blown to start the match.
Willem II's Mats Kohlert has been booked in Tilburg.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half is underway in Tilburg.
Dries Saddiki is replacing Mats Kohlert for the home team.
In the minute 46, John Yeboah is on a sub for Che Nunnely for Willem II.
Vangelis Pavlidis puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye with an assist there.
In the minute 51, Goal! Willem II extend their lead to 2-0 through Gorkem Saglam.
John Yeboah puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
That's a fine assist from Gorkem Saglam.
In the minute 57, The away team replace Delano Burgzorg with Mohamed Amissi.
Almelo make their second substitution with Sinan Bakis replacing Adrian Szoke.
Almelo make their third substitution with Rohat Agca replacing Rai Vloet.
In the minute 58, The away team have replaced Luca de la Torre with Jeremy Cijntje. This is the fourth substitution made today by Frank Wormuth.
Adrie Koster (Willem II) is making a third substitution, with Miquel Nelom replacing Derrick Kohn.
Frank Wormuth (Almelo) has taken off Janis Blaswich who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Brouwer Michael is the replacement.
In the minute 84, Goal! Vangelis Pavlidis extends Willem II's lead to 4-0.
Mike Tresor Ndayishimiye instrumental with a fine assist.
Jasper Dahlhaus is replacing Gorkem Saglam for Willem II at Willem II Stadion.
In the minute 86, Adrie Koster is making the team's fifth substitution at Willem II Stadion with Jop van den Avert replacing Jordens Peters.
Jeroen Manschot blows to end the match. The final score is 4-0.
